amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds for the Cooperative Threat Reduction Program in Russia and Belarus until the President certifies to Congress that Russia has met ten conditions relating to arms control, Russian foreign and military policy and Russian exports.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the Cooperative Threat Reduction de-nuclearization program for any activities in Russia or Belarus until such time that the President certifies that Russia is in compliance with all arms control agreements, is not engaged in developing offensive biological or chemical weapons, has ceased further construction at the military site at Yamantau Mountain, is not modernizing its nuclear arsenal, has ceased military action in Chechnya, and is not providing military assistance to any military force in the region of Moldova.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 220 (Roll no. 170).
